A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can't decide whether I like this movie or not. There were some awesome moments and the acting was very well done. I liked the general story arch of Rey\, Luke and Kylo.\n\nThe major downsides to this movie are the following: Super lazy story writing\, Finn and Rose's mission was a waste of screen time and boring. There were a lot of eye roll moments for me. Finally\, I did not like the way Luke was handled at the end.
